user_query: My company is organizing an event on Islamic culture. Can you help us with information about Islamic art, music, and literature? Additionally, we would like to have a chat with your Islam&AI Bot to discuss the significance of these cultural aspects.

TaskList.description: Gather information about Islamic art, including history, key artists, and notable artworks.
Collect information about Islamic music, including types of music, instruments used, and notable musicians.
Research Islamic literature, focusing on significant authors, historical context, and famous works.
Compile and summarize the information gathered from subtasks 1, 2, and 3 into a report.
Facilitate a chat session with the Islam&AI Bot to discuss the significance of Islamic art, music, and literature.
